segments.text: There is a fire in your building . You need to evacuate immediately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? A fire ? Oh , my God ! What shall I do ? Please get me out of here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't panic ! We'll help you get out of the building safely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please follow my instructions . Use a wet towel to cover your mouth and nose . Walk quietly to th nearest emergency exit . Now go get the wet towel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , I need to go back to get my jewelry box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't take your personal belongings . We need to get out of the building now !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gosh ! I can see the flames !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Crouch down and try not to breathe in the smoke .
segments.speaker: S2
